It is characterized by its striking, lance-shaped leaves that are adorned with distinctive white or pale green spots. The plant typically grows in moist, shaded environments, such as forest floors or rocky crevices. Its flowers are small and clustered, often in dense inflorescences, and are usually a pale yellow or greenish-white color.
